description: The National Cancer Institute and other institutions provide resources to help you in your research and work with patients.

0.body:
Cancer Genetics Overview (PDQ®) – Health Professional Version
Comprehensive, peer-reviewed, evidence-based information about cancer genetics.

Clinical and Continuing Education | The Jackson Laboratory
Free courses for CME/CNE credit on a wide range of topics including interpreting cancer genetic testing results.
0.title: Educational resources

1.body:
Steps to find a clinical trial
This patient guide to finding a clinical trial can also help guide your search.

NCI-Supported clinical trials search
Search for available clinical trials.

2.title: Research funding

3.body:
NCI Dictionary of Cancer Terms
Terms related to cancer and medicine.

NCI Drug Dictionary
Technical definitions and synonyms for drugs/agents used to treat patients with cancer or conditions related to cancer.
